mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GpurchaseReply(boardNum, replyContent, userID, replyDate, replyGID, replyOrder, replyParents) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{replyContent}, #{userID}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), #{replyGID}, #{replyOrder}, #{replyParents})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GpurchaseReply WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum} or replyGID = #{replyGID}
